.. _class_AABB:

AABB
====

3D è½´å¯¹é½è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-introduction-group

æè¿°
----

**AABB** å†…ç½® :ref:`Variant<class_Variant>` ç±»å‹è¡¨ç¤º 3D ç©ºé—´ä¸­çš„è½´å¯¹é½è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†ã€‚å®ƒç”±å…¶ :ref:`position<class_AABB_property_position>` å’Œ :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>` å®šä¹‰ï¼Œçš†ä¸º :ref:`Vector3<class_Vector3>` ç±»å‹ã€‚å®ƒç»å¸¸è¢«ç”¨äºå¿«é€Ÿé‡å æµ‹è¯•ï¼ˆå‚è§ :ref:`intersects<class_AABB_method_intersects>`\ ï¼‰ã€‚è™½ç„¶ **AABB** æœ¬èº«æ˜¯è½´å¯¹é½çš„ï¼Œä½†å®ƒå¯ä»¥ä¸ :ref:`Transform3D<class_Transform3D>` ç»„åˆæ¥è¡¨ç¤ºæ—‹è½¬æˆ–å€¾æ–œçš„è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†ã€‚

å®ƒä½¿ç”¨æµ®ç‚¹åæ ‡ã€‚\ **AABB** çš„ 2D ç­‰æ•ˆä½“æ˜¯ :ref:`Rect2<class_Rect2>`\ ã€‚æ²¡æœ‰ä½¿ç”¨æ•´æ•°åæ ‡çš„ **AABB** ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ ä¸æ”¯æŒè´Ÿçš„ :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>`\ ã€‚å¯¹äºè´Ÿå¤§å°ï¼Œå¤§å¤šæ•° **AABB** æ–¹æ³•éƒ½æ— æ³•æ­£å¸¸å·¥ä½œã€‚ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`abs<class_AABB_method_abs>` è·å–å…·æœ‰éè´Ÿå¤§å°çš„ç­‰æ•ˆ **AABB**\ ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ åœ¨å¸ƒå°”ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚æœ :ref:`position<class_AABB_property_position>` å’Œ :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>` å‡ä¸ºé›¶ï¼ˆç­‰äº :ref:`Vector3.ZERO<class_Vector3_constant_ZERO>`\ ï¼‰ï¼Œåˆ™ **AABB** çš„è®¡ç®—ç»“æœä¸º ``false``\ ã€‚å¦åˆ™ï¼Œå®ƒçš„è®¡ç®—ç»“æœå§‹ç»ˆä¸º ``true``\ ã€‚

.. note::

	é€šè¿‡ C# ä½¿ç”¨è¯¥ API æ—¶ä¼šæœ‰æ˜¾è‘—ä¸åŒï¼Œè¯¦è§ :ref:`doc_c_sharp_differences`\ ã€‚

.. _class_AABB_method_abs:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`AABB<class_AABB>` **abs**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_abs>`

è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªä¸è¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†ç­‰æ•ˆçš„ **AABB**\ ï¼Œå…¶å®½åº¦ã€é«˜åº¦å’Œæ·±åº¦è¢«ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºéè´Ÿå€¼ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var box = AABB(Vector3(5, 0, 5), Vector3(-20, -10, -5))
    var absolute = box.abs()
    print(absolute.position) # æ‰“å° (-15, -10, 0)
    print(absolute.size)     # æ‰“å° (20, 10, 5)

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var box = new Aabb(new Vector3(5, 0, 5), new Vector3(-20, -10, -5));
    var absolute = box.Abs();
    GD.Print(absolute.Position); // æ‰“å° (-15, -10, 0)
    GD.Print(absolute.Size);     // æ‰“å° (20, 10, 5)



\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å½“ :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>` ä¸ºè´Ÿæ—¶ï¼Œå»ºè®®ä½¿ç”¨è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå› ä¸º Godot ä¸­çš„å¤§å¤šæ•°å…¶ä»–æ–¹æ³•éƒ½å‡è®¾ :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>` çš„åˆ†é‡å¤§äº ``0``\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_AABB_method_encloses:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **encloses**\ (\ with\: :ref:`AABB<class_AABB>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_encloses>`

å¦‚æœè¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†\ *å®Œå…¨*\ åŒ…å›´ ``with`` æ¡†ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚ä¸¤ä¸ªæ¡†çš„è¾¹éƒ½åŒ…æ‹¬åœ¨å†…ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var a = AABB(Vector3(0, 0, 0), Vector3(4, 4, 4))
    var b = AABB(Vector3(1, 1, 1), Vector3(3, 3, 3))
    var c = AABB(Vector3(2, 2, 2), Vector3(8, 8, 8))
    
    print(a.encloses(a)) # æ‰“å° true
    print(a.encloses(b)) # æ‰“å° true
    print(a.encloses(c)) # æ‰“å° false

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var a = new Aabb(new Vector3(0, 0, 0), new Vector3(4, 4, 4));
    var b = new Aabb(new Vector3(1, 1, 1), new Vector3(3, 3, 3));
    var c = new Aabb(new Vector3(2, 2, 2), new Vector3(8, 8, 8));
    
    GD.Print(a.Encloses(a)); // æ‰“å° True
    GD.Print(a.Encloses(b)); // æ‰“å° True
    GD.Print(a.Encloses(c)); // æ‰“å° False



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_AABB_method_expand:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`AABB<class_AABB>` **expand**\ (\ to_point\: :ref:`Vector3<class_Vector3>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_expand>`

è¿”å›è¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„å‰¯æœ¬ï¼Œå¦‚æœ‰å¿…è¦ï¼Œè¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†è¢«æ‰©å±•ä¸ºå°†è¾¹ä¸ç»™å®šçš„ ``to_point`` å¯¹é½ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var box = AABB(Vector3(0, 0, 0), Vector3(5, 2, 5))
    
    box = box.expand(Vector3(10, 0, 0))
    print(box.position) # æ‰“å° (0, 0, 0)
    print(box.size)     # æ‰“å° (10, 2, 5)
    
    box = box.expand(Vector3(-5, 0, 5))
    print(box.position) # æ‰“å° (-5, 0, 0)
    print(box.size)     # æ‰“å° (15, 2, 5)

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var box = new Aabb(new Vector3(0, 0, 0), new Vector3(5, 2, 5));
    
    box = box.Expand(new Vector3(10, 0, 0));
    GD.Print(box.Position); // æ‰“å° (0, 0, 0)
    GD.Print(box.Size);     // æ‰“å° (10, 2, 5)
    
    box = box.Expand(new Vector3(-5, 0, 5));
    GD.Print(box.Position); // æ‰“å° (-5, 0, 0)
    GD.Print(box.Size);     // æ‰“å° (15, 2, 5)

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Vector3<class_Vector3>` **get_center**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_get_center>`

è¿”å›è¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹ã€‚è¿™ä¸ ``position + (size / 2.0)`` ç›¸åŒã€‚

.. _class_AABB_method_get_endpoint:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Vector3<class_Vector3>` **get_endpoint**\ (\ idx\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_get_endpoint>`

è¿”å›ç»„æˆè¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„ 8 ä¸ªé¡¶ç‚¹ä¹‹ä¸€çš„ä½ç½®ã€‚å½“ ``idx`` ä¸º ``0`` æ—¶ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ :ref:`position<class_AABB_property_position>` ç›¸åŒï¼›\ ``idx`` ä¸º ``7`` æ—¶ï¼Œä¸ :ref:`end<class_AABB_property_end>` ç›¸åŒã€‚

.. _class_AABB_method_get_longest_axis:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Vector3<class_Vector3>` **get_longest_axis**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_get_longest_axis>`

è¿”å›è¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„ :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>` çš„æœ€é•¿å½’ä¸€åŒ–è½´ï¼Œä½œä¸º :ref:`Vector3<class_Vector3>`\ ï¼ˆ\ :ref:`Vector3.RIGHT<class_Vector3_constant_RIGHT>`\ ã€\ :ref:`Vector3.UP<class_Vector3_constant_UP>` æˆ– :ref:`Vector3.BACK<class_Vector3_constant_BACK>`\ ï¼‰ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var box = AABB(Vector3(0, 0, 0), Vector3(2, 4, 8))
    
    print(box.get_longest_axis())       # æ‰“å° (0, 0, 1)
    print(box.get_longest_axis_index()) # æ‰“å° 2
    print(box.get_longest_axis_size())  # æ‰“å° 8

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var box = new Aabb(new Vector3(0, 0, 0), new Vector3(2, 4, 8));
    
    GD.Print(box.GetLongestAxis());      // æ‰“å° (0, 0, 1)
    GD.Print(box.GetLongestAxisIndex()); // æ‰“å° 2
    GD.Print(box.GetLongestAxisSize());  // æ‰“å° 8



å¦è§ :ref:`get_longest_axis_index<class_AABB_method_get_longest_axis_index>` å’Œ :ref:`get_longest_axis_size<class_AABB_method_get_longest_axis_size>`\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_AABB_method_get_longest_axis_index:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`int<class_int>` **get_longest_axis_index**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_get_longest_axis_index>`

è¿”å›è¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„ :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>` çš„æœ€é•¿è½´çš„ç´¢å¼•ï¼ˆè§ :ref:`Vector3.AXIS_X<class_Vector3_constant_AXIS_X>`\ ã€\ :ref:`Vector3.AXIS_Y<class_Vector3_constant_AXIS_Y>` å’Œ :ref:`Vector3.AXIS_Z<class_Vector3_constant_AXIS_Z>`\ ï¼‰ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹è§ :ref:`get_longest_axis<class_AABB_method_get_longest_axis>`\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_AABB_method_get_longest_axis_size:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`float<class_float>` **get_longest_axis_size**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_get_longest_axis_size>`

è¿”å›è¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„ :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>` çš„æœ€é•¿å°ºåº¦ã€‚

æœ‰å…³ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œè¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`get_longest_axis<class_AABB_method_get_longest_axis>`\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_AABB_method_get_shortest_axis:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Vector3<class_Vector3>` **get_shortest_axis**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_get_shortest_axis>`

Returns the shortest normalized axis of this bounding box's :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>`, as a :ref:`Vector3<class_Vector3>` (:ref:`Vector3.RIGHT<class_Vector3_constant_RIGHT>`, :ref:`Vector3.UP<class_Vector3_constant_UP>`, or :ref:`Vector3.BACK<class_Vector3_constant_BACK>`).


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var box = AABB(Vector3(0, 0, 0), Vector3(2, 4, 8))
    
    print(box.get_shortest_axis())       # Prints (1, 0, 0)
    print(box.get_shortest_axis_index()) # Prints 0
    print(box.get_shortest_axis_size())  # Prints 2

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var box = new Aabb(new Vector3(0, 0, 0), new Vector3(2, 4, 8));
    
    GD.Print(box.GetShortestAxis());      // Prints (1, 0, 0)
    GD.Print(box.GetShortestAxisIndex()); // Prints 0
    GD.Print(box.GetShortestAxisSize());  // Prints 2



See also :ref:`get_shortest_axis_index<class_AABB_method_get_shortest_axis_index>` and :ref:`get_shortest_axis_size<class_AABB_method_get_shortest_axis_size>`.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_AABB_method_get_shortest_axis_index:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`int<class_int>` **get_shortest_axis_index**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_get_shortest_axis_index>`

è¿”å›è¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„ :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>` çš„æœ€çŸ­è½´çš„ç´¢å¼•ï¼ˆè§ :ref:`Vector3.AXIS_X<class_Vector3_constant_AXIS_X>`\ ã€\ :ref:`Vector3.AXIS_Y<class_Vector3_constant_AXIS_Y>` å’Œ :ref:`Vector3.AXIS_Z<class_Vector3_constant_AXIS_Z>`\ ï¼‰ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹è§ :ref:`get_shortest_axis<class_AABB_method_get_shortest_axis>`\ ã€‚

è¿”å›è¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„ :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>` çš„æœ€çŸ­å°ºåº¦ã€‚

æœ‰å…³ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œè¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`get_shortest_axis<class_AABB_method_get_shortest_axis>`\ ã€‚

è¿”å›ç»™å®šæ–¹å‘ä¸Šæœ€è¿œçš„è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„é¡¶ç‚¹ä½ç½®ã€‚è¯¥ç‚¹åœ¨ç¢°æ’æ£€æµ‹ç®—æ³•ä¸­é€šå¸¸è¢«ç§°ä¸ºæ”¯æ’‘ç‚¹ã€‚

.. _class_AABB_method_get_volume:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`float<class_float>` **get_volume**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_get_volume>`

è¿”å›è¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„ä½“ç§¯ã€‚è¿™ç›¸å½“äº ``size.x * size.y * size.z``\ ã€‚å¦è¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`has_volume<class_AABB_method_has_volume>`\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_AABB_method_grow:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`AABB<class_AABB>` **grow**\ (\ by\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_grow>`

è¿”å›è¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„å‰¯æœ¬ï¼Œè¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†åœ¨æ‰€æœ‰è¾¹ä¸Šæ‰©å±•ç»™å®šé‡ ``by``\ ã€‚è´Ÿæ•°ä¼šç¼©å°è¯¥æ¡†ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var a = AABB(Vector3(4, 4, 4), Vector3(8, 8, 8)).grow(4)
    print(a.position) # æ‰“å° (0, 0, 0)
    print(a.size)     # æ‰“å° (16, 16, 16)
    
    var b = AABB(Vector3(0, 0, 0), Vector3(8, 4, 2)).grow(2)
    print(b.position) # æ‰“å° (-2, -2, -2)
    print(b.size)     # æ‰“å° (12, 8, 6)

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var a = new Aabb(new Vector3(4, 4, 4), new Vector3(8, 8, 8)).Grow(4);
    GD.Print(a.Position); // æ‰“å° (0, 0, 0)
    GD.Print(a.Size);     // æ‰“å° (16, 16, 16)
    
    var b = new Aabb(new Vector3(0, 0, 0), new Vector3(8, 4, 2)).Grow(2);
    GD.Print(b.Position); // æ‰“å° (-2, -2, -2)
    GD.Print(b.Size);     // æ‰“å° (12, 8, 6)

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **has_point**\ (\ point\: :ref:`Vector3<class_Vector3>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_has_point>`

å¦‚æœè¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†åŒ…å«ç»™å®šçš„ ``point``\ ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚ä¾ç…§æƒ¯ä¾‹ï¼Œ\ **ä¸**\ åŒ…æ‹¬æ­£å¥½ä½äºå³ä¾§ã€é¡¶éƒ¨å’Œå‰ä¾§çš„ç‚¹ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å¯¹äºå…·æœ‰\ *è´Ÿ* :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>` çš„ **AABB**\ ï¼Œè¯¥æ–¹æ³•å¹¶ä¸å¯é ã€‚è¯·é¦–å…ˆä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`abs<class_AABB_method_abs>` è·å–ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰æ•ˆçš„è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-method

å¦‚æœè¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†å…·æœ‰è¡¨é¢æˆ–é•¿åº¦ï¼Œå³ :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>` çš„è‡³å°‘ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ†é‡å¤§äº ``0``\ ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚å¦åˆ™ï¼Œè¿”å› ``false``\ ã€‚

å¦‚æœè¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„å®½åº¦ã€é«˜åº¦å’Œæ·±åº¦å‡ä¸ºæ­£å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚å¦è§ :ref:`get_volume<class_AABB_method_get_volume>`\ ã€‚

.. _class_AABB_method_intersection:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`AABB<class_AABB>` **intersection**\ (\ with\: :ref:`AABB<class_AABB>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_method_intersection>`

è¿”å›è¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†ä¸ ``with`` ä¹‹é—´çš„äº¤é›†ã€‚å¦‚æœæ¡†ä¸ç›¸äº¤ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›ç©ºçš„ **AABB**\ ã€‚å¦‚æœæ¡†åœ¨è¾¹ç›¸äº¤ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›æ²¡æœ‰ä½“ç§¯çš„å¹³ **AABB**\ ï¼ˆè¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`has_surface<class_AABB_method_has_surface>` å’Œ :ref:`has_volume<class_AABB_method_has_volume>`\ ï¼‰ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var box1 = AABB(Vector3(0, 0, 0), Vector3(5, 2, 8))
    var box2 = AABB(Vector3(2, 0, 2), Vector3(8, 4, 4))
    
    var intersection = box1.intersection(box2)
    print(intersection.position) # æ‰“å° (2, 0, 2)
    print(intersection.size)     # æ‰“å° (3, 2, 4)

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var box1 = new Aabb(new Vector3(0, 0, 0), new Vector3(5, 2, 8));
    var box2 = new Aabb(new Vector3(2, 0, 2), new Vector3(8, 4, 4));
    
    var intersection = box1.Intersection(box2);
    GD.Print(intersection.Position); // æ‰“å° (2, 0, 2)
    GD.Print(intersection.Size);     // æ‰“å° (3, 2, 4)



\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å¦‚æœä½ åªéœ€è¦çŸ¥é“ä¸¤ä¸ªè¾¹ç•Œæ¡†æ˜¯å¦ç›¸äº¤ï¼Œè¯·æ”¹ç”¨ :ref:`intersects<class_AABB_method_intersects>`\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

å¦‚æœè¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†ä¸æ¡† ``with`` é‡å ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚ä¸¤ä¸ªæ¡†çš„è¾¹\ *æ€»æ˜¯*\ è¢«æ’é™¤ã€‚

.. _class_AABB_operator_mul_Transform3D:

.. rst-class:: classref-operator

:ref:`AABB<class_AABB>` **operator ***\ (\ right\: :ref:`Transform3D<class_Transform3D>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_operator_mul_Transform3D>`

å‡è®¾è¯¥å˜æ¢çš„åŸºæ˜¯æ­£äº¤çš„ï¼ˆå³æ—‹è½¬/åå°„å¯ä»¥ï¼Œç¼©æ”¾/å€¾æ–œåˆ™ä¸è¡Œï¼‰ï¼Œå°† **AABB** é€†å‘å˜æ¢ï¼ˆä¹˜ä»¥ï¼‰ç»™å®šçš„ :ref:`Transform3D<class_Transform3D>` å˜æ¢çŸ©é˜µã€‚

\ ``aabb * transform`` ç›¸å½“äº ``transform.inverse() * aabb``\ ã€‚è§ :ref:`Transform3D.inverse<class_Transform3D_method_inverse>`\ ã€‚

å¯¹äºé€šè¿‡ä»¿å°„å˜æ¢çš„é€†è¿›è¡Œçš„å˜æ¢ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œç¼©æ”¾ï¼‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ ``transform.affine_inverse() * aabb`` ä»£æ›¿ã€‚è§ :ref:`Transform3D.affine_inverse<class_Transform3D_method_affine_inverse>`\ ã€‚

.. _class_AABB_operator_eq_AABB:

.. rst-class:: classref-operator

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **operator ==**\ (\ right\: :ref:`AABB<class_AABB>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_AABB_operator_eq_AABB>`

å¦‚æœä¸¤ä¸ªè¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„ :ref:`position<class_AABB_property_position>` å®Œå…¨ç›¸ç­‰ä¸” :ref:`size<class_AABB_property_size>` å®Œå…¨ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚

.. |virtual| replace:: :abbr:`virtual (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•é€šå¸¸éœ€è¦ç”¨æˆ·è¦†ç›–æ‰èƒ½ç”Ÿæ•ˆã€‚)`
.. |const| replace:: :abbr:`const (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•æ— å‰¯ä½œç”¨ï¼Œä¸ä¼šä¿®æ”¹è¯¥å®ä¾‹çš„ä»»ä½•æˆå‘˜å˜é‡ã€‚)`
.. |vararg| replace:: :abbr:`vararg (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•é™¤äº†èƒ½æ¥å—åœ¨æ­¤å¤„æè¿°çš„å‚æ•°å¤–ï¼Œè¿˜èƒ½å¤Ÿç»§ç»­æ¥å—ä»»æ„æ•°é‡çš„å‚æ•°ã€‚)`
.. |constructor| replace:: :abbr:`constructor (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•ç”¨äºæ„é€ æŸä¸ªç±»å‹ã€‚)`
.. |static| replace:: :abbr:`static (è°ƒç”¨æœ¬æ–¹æ³•æ— éœ€å®ä¾‹ï¼Œå¯ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ç±»åè¿›è¡Œè°ƒç”¨ã€‚)`
.. |operator| replace:: :abbr:`operator (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•æè¿°çš„æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨æœ¬ç±»å‹ä½œä¸ºå·¦æ“ä½œæ•°çš„æœ‰æ•ˆè¿ç®—ç¬¦ã€‚)`
.. |bitfield| replace:: :abbr:`BitField (è¿™ä¸ªå€¼æ˜¯ç”±ä¸‹åˆ—ä½æ ‡å¿—æ„æˆä½æ©ç çš„æ•´æ•°ã€‚)`
.. |void| replace:: :abbr:`void (æ— è¿”å›å€¼ã€‚)`
